t: Visual Search
s: Tap on the ‘Upload a photo’ ... on Amazon. On uploading an image, you will see one dot for each item we detected. You can also circle around an item to search. To search a specific item in the photo, you can circle around the item. In cases the item is blurry or too small, we may not be able to recognize it. You can add text in the search bar to specify brand, change color ...

t: Amazon Photos Storage
s: Prime members get unlimited, full-resolution photo storage and 5 GB video storage. Need more storage? Plans start at 100 GB and go all the way up to 30 TB. Once saved, your memories remain secure and easily accessible across devices with the Amazon Photos app.
